channel.title: VPS Tips and Tricks?
channel.description: A while ago there was a thread posted that had a huge list of common VPS providers with some user experiences, etc. Does anyone know the link to it? I can't find it to save my life :o

item.title: VPS Tips and Tricks?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:413044”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=514517.msg3735031#msg3735031 date=1314895370]
A while ago there was a thread posted that had a huge list of common VPS providers with some user experiences, etc. Does anyone know the link to it? I can’t find it to save my life :o
[/quote]
Think it was removed or something, don’t feel like looking for it. What’s the problem that your having?[/quote]

I wanted the list of providers and their comparison, but I’ve already gotten one, went with VPSInfinity

Read full topic
